thread.title: Bangkok Airways to connect Phutket and Hat Yai
thread.title_full: Bangkok Airways to connect Phutket and Hat Yai

title: Bangkok Airways to connect Phutket and Hat Yai
text: Home » travel » Bangkok Airways to connect Phutket and Hat Yai Bangkok Airways to connect Phutket and Hat Yai October 15, 2015 10:12 am Bangkok Airways Public Company Limited led by Mr. Puttipong Prasarttong-Osoth, President ,organized the inauguration celebration of airline's new service connecting between Phuket and Hat Yai. The celebration was held at the Theptaro Ballroom of Burisriphu Hotel Hat Yai and was attended by many VIPs, travel agency representatives and local media. Mr. Puttipong Prasarttong-Osoth, President of Bangkok Airways PCL said "Bangkok Airways foresees the potential of Phuket and Hat Yai as prominent destinations of leisure and business. Phuket is recognized as one of the world's most famous tourist attractions where millions of travelers from all over the world have visited. Hat Yai is a major commercial city of Southern Thailand and a gateway to Malaysia and Singapore. This new service between Phuket and Hat Yai will certainly enhance the growth of tourism and economy due to the convenience and ease of travel." "Bangkok Airways currently operates several routes between Phuket and Thailand's most popular destinations such as Phuket-Bangkok (8 flights daily), Phuket- Chiang Mai (1 flight daily), Phuket- Samui (4 flights daily) and Phuket-U-tapao ( Pattaya ) (1 flight daily). This new direct route will certainly offer a greater choice to our passengers in Hat Yai to be able to connect to Phuket and to other destinations within Bangkok Airways network, which ultimately will drive the tourism industry in both ends," Mr. Puttipong added. Bangkok Airways offers daily flight between Phuket and Hat Yai, operated by ATR72-500/600 which consists of 70 economy class seats. From Phuket to Hat Yai, PG298 departs from Phuket at 07.25 hrs arrives Hat Yai at 08.30 hrs and back to Phuket by PG299 departs from Hat Yai at 09.10 hrs arrives Phuket at 10.15 hrs, For more information and reservation, please call Bangkok Airways Call Center at 1771 (24 hrs). Advance web check-in is also available for passengers of Bangkok Airways; interested passengers can simply visit www.bangkokair.com for more details. 209 Viewed
